Job Title: Sales Trainer

Location: Madison County, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Overview

Founded in 1967, ImageFIRST is the largest healthcare linen rental and laundry services provider to medical facilities throughout the continental United States and Puerto Rico, with a specialty in serving the healthcare market.

Check out our company page: https://www.imagefirst.com/company/

Responsibilities & Qualifications

Reporting to the VP of Customer Success, this position will be key to supporting the rapid expansion of ImageFIRST sales roles including Territory Business Manager, Director of Hospital Sales, and Account Executive. The Sales Trainers will be responsible for training including but not limited to: 13-week success track for new hires, new product rollouts, probing questions, objection handling, presentation skills, contract negotiations, and closing techniques.

Responsibilities:

 Be the expert at the ImageFIRST sales process  Travel and deliver training in person with new sales team members  Ride along with sales reps to inspect the sales process and provide feedback  Attend all required sales meetings  Become the expert with any new product or service  Track training status for any new sales team member  Give feedback on sales team members to the appropriate sales leader  Provide training support for sales blitzes, promos, etc. 


Minimum Requirements: 

 Minimum of 4+ years outside sales/sales training  Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in experience  Ability to travel - 60-75%  Ability to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing  General computer knowledge required  Basic math required: addition, subtraction, division, multiplication  Well-respected by peers and local leadership  Coachable and flexible to process changes  Maintain regular, dependable attendance and high-level performance  Ability to learn new skills and take on additional job responsibilities as needed 


Company Values & Benefits

Required Competencies:

 Be Respectful: Value all we come in contact with  Be Remarkable: Create a positive moment with every interaction  Be Safe: Keep ourselves and those around us safe  Be Honest: Be guided by truthfulness in all we do 


Benefits:

 Competitive pay  Medical, Dental, Vision  Pet, Legal, and Hospital Indemnity Insurance  401k (match)  Paid Time Off Package  Great company culture  Collaborative team environment 


EOE / Drug-Free Workplace

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We are fueled by the talent, passion, and diversity of our associates.

#INDIF #CB

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
